description:
Quick-drying pants for camping or summer travels. Zip off the lower legs to stay comfortable through blazing heat, then zip them back on for cool evenings. The fabric is treated to shed water, so you can take them hiking or paddling. Light, packable and quick-drying – the Guide Convertible Pants score a summertime hat trick.Made of mini-ripstop nylon with a DWR finish.Designed for girls, with a slimmer leg and shorts that hit mid-thigh.Zippered fly with snap closure.Belt loops.Colour-coded leg zippers help you put the legs on correctly.Interior waistband adjusts to accommodate growth.2 front patch pockets with slash openings.1 rear pocket with zip closure for secure storage.Inseam for pants is 71cm in size 12.Shorts inseam is 13cm.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Tight, with no room to spare.





Very close fit, with a bit of room.





Generous, but not oversized.





Oversized with lots of room for layers.


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.
